name: Kento
description: What is the project about? $KNTO the awkward monkey created Kentocoin, the biggest meme coin ever. Memes and laughter flooded the internet as the community grew. Kento's pranks, humor, and memes skyrocketed its value, making him a legend in the crypto world. Kentocoin proved that fun, finance, and memes could all go hand in hand. What makes your project unique? Our team. Having a team of 50 Kentos working strategically and creatively to make this the biggest meme project. History of your project. We as the founders have a creative successful background with business and we created a mint color pallet to bring freshness to web 3 space. Our mindset is to bring light into the community, have fun, and make this a viral sensation. What’s next for your project? We are working on unique merch and NFT drops for our holders. We will let the community decide which exchanges we want to list next. What can your token be used for? Our KNTO coins are made to bring joy, excitement, and craziness in everyone’s life. We are planning to have games on our site where people can use KNTO to play-2-burn
